txt.en: A raiding pack of Wargs led by a goblin Warg-rider has overtaken the hidden vault of Mezel-saluch. If the dwarf-weapons and treasures contained therein are to be safeguarded, the raiders must be slain or driven off.

'This cannot be borne, [placeholder]! An entire pack of Wargs has taken over the vault of Mezel-saluch while the vile goblin leading them loots the legendary treasures within!

'We cannot move a force large enough to stop them that far into Durin's Way in time...but if you can gather a few stalwart companions, you might be able to stop them!

'Mezel-saluch lies in Durin's Way.'
Mezel-saluch can be found in Durin's Way.\n\nGansi has asked you to defeat the Wargs within the vault of Mezel-saluch before their leader can make off with the treasures within.

'You've done it, [placeholder]! With the Wargs driven off, the vault of Mezel-saluch is secure...for now at least.

'I will see about organizing a small expedition to explore it properly, as soon as things settle down a bit.

'My thanks to you!'
Gansi is at the Chamber of the Crossroads, in Durin's Way.\n\nYou should return to Gansi and tell him that the Warg-pack raiders in Mezel-saluch have been defeated.
'What can we do? Even now the ancient vault of Mezel-saluch is being looted right beneath our beards, and we are helpless to stop them!'
Talk to Gansi at the Chamber of the Crossroads
